sentences.english: Fares are valid on Greyhound schedules and those of participating interline carriers.
sentences.chinese: 该票价在灰狗和那些参加联营的运营计划内有效。

sentences.english: That fast food business have expanded through the sale of franchise .
sentences.chinese: 该快餐店通过出售联营经销权而扩大了生意。

sentences.english: Green Group, a joint venture of one of St…
sentences.chinese: 绿之圣集团公司的联营企业之一。

sentences.english: The termination of association shall be subject to the cancellation formalities by the judicial administrative organ of the province level.
sentences.chinese: 终止联营的，由省级司法行政机关办理注销手续。

sentences.english: The chains can become a warehouse for books because of their size.
sentences.chinese: 联营的书店因为规模大它们自身就是仓库。

sentences.english: Chapter 4: risk in project financing for CPPP.
sentences.chinese: 第4章，电联营项目融资中的风险。

sentences.english: Iwaki has set up its joint ventures in 27 countries all over the world.
sentences.chinese: 易威奇在全球廿七个国家和地区设有联营公司。

sentences.english: The results of associated companies are accounted for by the company on the basis of dividends received and receivable.
sentences.chinese: 联营公司的业绩由本公司根据已收及应收的股息入帐。

sentences.english: Accounting method used in any merger which is not treated as a pooling of interests.
sentences.chinese: 用于各种形式的企业合并，不将其用权益联营法处理。
